verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H139>Adoni-zedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and had utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it; <S%H834>as<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and her <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and her <S%H4428>king;<s%> and <S%H3588>how<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> had made <S%H7999>peace<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them;

That they <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4467>royal<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> thereof were <S%H1368>mighty.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H139>Adoni-zedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1944>Hoham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6502>Piram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3309>Japhia<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and <S%H5826>help<s%> me, that we may <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it hath made <S%H7999>peace<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4264>hosts,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and made <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7503>Slack<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> from thy <S%H4480>servants;<s%> <S%H5650><s%> come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> us <S%H4120>quickly,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> us, and <S%H5826>help<s%> us: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> us.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> them <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into thine <S%H3027>hand;<s%> there shall <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> and <S%H7291>chased<s%> them along the <S%H1870>way<s%> that goeth <S%H4608>up<s%> to <S%H1032>Beth-horon,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> and <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as they <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and were in the going <S%H4174>down<s%> to <S%H1032>Beth-horon,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> cast <S%H7993>down<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> and they <S%H4191>died:<s%> they were <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> with <S%H1259>hailstones<s%> <S%H68><s%> than they <S%H4480>whom<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> delivered <S%H5414>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8121>Sun,<s%> stand thou <S%H1826>still<s%> upon <S%H1391>Gibeon;<s%> and thou, <S%H3394>Moon,<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H357>Ajalon.<s%>

And the <S%H8121>sun<s%> stood <S%H1826>still,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H5975>stayed,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> had <S%H5358>avenged<s%> themselves upon their <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3477>Jasher?<s%> So the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> still in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H213>hasted<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to go <S%H935>down<s%> about a <S%H8549>whole<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> like <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it or <S%H310>after<s%> it, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H376>man:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>
But <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and hid <S%H2244>themselves<s%> in a <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2244>hid<s%> in a <S%H4631>cave<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1556>Roll<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> it for to <S%H8104>keep<s%> them:

And <S%H5975>stay<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> but <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and smite the <S%H2179>hindmost<s%> of them; <S%H5414>suffer<s%> them <S%H408>not<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> their <S%H5892>cities:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5221>slaying<s%> them with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> they were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> that the <S%H8300>rest<s%> which <S%H8277>remained<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H2782>moved<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> against <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H6605>Open<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4631>cave.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4631>cave,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5700>Eglon.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7101>captains<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> which <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, Come <S%H7126>near,<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%> And they came <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of them.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> against <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3898>fight.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> them, and <S%H8518>hanged<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H6086>trees:<s%> and they <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8518>hanging<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and they took them <S%H3381>down<s%> off the <S%H4480>trees,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6086><s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had been <S%H2244>hid,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H4631>cave's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> which remain <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4719>Makkedah,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof he utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were therein; he <S%H7604>let<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H8300>remain:<s%> and he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4719>Makkedah<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H4480>Makkedah,<s%> <S%H4719><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, unto <S%H3841>Libnah,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> Libnah: <S%H3841><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it <S%H1571>also,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were therein; he <S%H7604>let<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H8300>remain<s%> in it; but <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H4480>Libnah,<s%> <S%H3841><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, unto <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against it:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H3920>took<s%> it on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were therein, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H2036>Horam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3923>Lachish;<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he had <S%H7604>left<s%> him <S%H1115>none<s%> <S%H8300>remaining.<s%>

And from <S%H4480>Lachish<s%> <S%H3923><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> unto <S%H5700>Eglon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him; and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it:
